title: Apply AABoxes logo pink background to all non-Home pages (fix black background)

requirements.text: Extract the primary pink color from the uploaded AABoxes logo screenshot (image-12.png) and define it as a reusable theme token (e.g., a CSS custom property or Tailwind-safe variable) that can be applied as a page background color.
acceptanceCriteria: A single canonical "AABoxes pink" color token exists in the frontend styling system.
The chosen pink is sampled from image-12.png (not manually substituted with an unrelated pink).

requirements.text: Set the application background to the extracted AABoxes pink on every route/page except the Home ("Inicio") route ('/'). The Home route must keep its current background behavior.

quotes: hazlo del color rosado que tiene el logo de AABoxes. En todas las paginas excepto el Inicio

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting '/' (Home) keeps the current background styling (no forced pink page background applied globally).
Visiting '/admin/login' uses the extracted AABoxes pink as the page background (no black background visible).
Visiting '/admin' uses the extracted AABoxes pink as the page background (no black background visible).
No route shows an unintended black background as a result of this change.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/components/ui).
nonGoals: Do not change backend logic or data models.
